about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm currently an undergraduate 3rd Year student at the University of Glasgow, pursuing a degree in Electronic & Software Engineering. My journey in software development has been driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions and a love for technology.

I have a strong foundation in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, and C++, and I enjoy working on both front-end and back-end development. My interests include web development, machine learning, and open-source contributions.

Over the past few years, I've participated in numerous hackathons, with notable achievements in some of the largest hackathons. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy tackling complex problems with innovative solutions.

I've also worked as the Head of Software Development & IT at the University of Glasgow's Racing Team - UGRacing that builds Formula Student Racing Cars, where I led a team of developers to create software solutions that enhance our car's performance and data analysis capabilities.

I've also built and been involved in many open-source projects, contributing to the community and learning from other developers. My goal is to continue growing as a software engineer, taking on challenging projects that push the boundaries of technology.
